title: DELETE_ROPE
content:
0x52B48292813646490x748D72AF// DeleteRope
void DELETE_ROPE(int* ropeId);Parameters:ropeId: The handle of the rope to deleteDeletes the rope with the specified handle.You should check if the rope exists before trying to delete it, see DOES_ROPE_EXIST.For an example on how to use this native please refer to ADD_ROPE
